suite.name: Compra

kw.name: Dado que acesso o site Blazedemo
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Contains
kw.arg: Welcome to the Simple Travel Agency!
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` contains ``text``.

kw.name: Wait For Condition
kw.doc: Waits until ``condition`` is true or ``timeout`` expires.

kw.name: Quando seleciono a origem como "S達o Paolo" e destino como "New York"
kw.sourcename: Quando seleciono a origem como "${origem}" e destino como "${destino}"

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Select From List By Label
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'name = fromPort' by label S達o Paolo.

kw.name: Select From List By Label
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'name = toPort' by label New York.

kw.name: E clico no botao Find Flights
Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Entao exibe o titulo informando a origem e o destino
Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Element 'xpath = //h3' contains text 'Flights from S達o Paolo to New York:'.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: Your flight from TLV to SFO has been reserved.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath = //h2' contains exact text 'Your flight from TLV to SFO has been reserved.'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Viviane' into text field 'id = inputName'.

kw.name: Select From List By Label
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id = cardType' by label American Express.

kw.name: E marco a opcao Remember Me
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: E clico no botao Purchase Flight
Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Entao exibe a mensagem "Thank you for your purchase today!"
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath = //h1' contains exact text 'Thank you for your purchase today!'.

kw.name: E exibe o preco da passagem como "555 USD"
kw.sourcename: E exibe o preco da passagem como "${preco}"

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'css = tr:nth-child(3) > td:nth-child(2)' contains exact text '555 USD'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

suite.doc: Fluxo de compra no site Blazedemo
